item.name: psychotherapy.net
item.description: A database providing video seminars on many topics, including that of developmental psychology and trauma.

item.name: PubMed.gov
item.description: The National Library of Medicine provides listings of articles from biomedial literature across many sources.

item.name: JSTOR
item.description: JSTOR is a database with a awide variety of subjects covered, including psychological- and neuroscience-focused research on developmental trauma.

item.name: Proquest Central
item.description: Proquest Central collects many articles and resources across many subject areas.

item.name: CINAHL Plus with Full Text
item.description: CINAHL Plus is a database focused on medical perspectives, including psychological and neuroscience ones.

item.name: Google Scholar
item.description: Google Scholar is a search engine designed to find research articles.

item.name: Masterfile Premier
item.description: Masterfile Premier covers general subject areas, with some results for developmental trauma.

item.name: nda.nih.gov
item.description: The National Institute of Mental Health Data Archive provides data for research on mental health and illness topics.
